body_html:
@David-Mao I guess my question is if it is possible to have a Functional model instead of a custom Subclass model. Sorry I wasn't clear before. Would it be possible to do that?

I think someone as already mentioned this in the thread above but you cannot call a subclass model with a symbolic tensor in eager mode. From what I understand you want to call a layer multiple times in a model without sharing weights. I believe this is possible with a Functional model. Hence I want to understand if there is a use case for using subclass models here that I am missing.

body:
@David-Mao I guess my question is if it is possible to have a Functional model instead of a custom Subclass model. Sorry I wasn't clear before. Would it be possible to do that?  

I think someone as already mentioned this in the thread above but you cannot call a subclass model with a symbolic tensor in eager mode. From what I understand you want to call a layer multiple times in a model without sharing weights. I believe this is possible with a Functional model. Hence I want to understand if there is a use case for using subclass models here that I am missing.
